column3:
Qhoterl Pasol has a nose for perfumes.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine splendid amber at Mjrl's Regret<Else/>Deliver the splendid amber to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather splendid lavender at Mjrl's Regret<Else/>Deliver the splendid lavender to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Spearfish a splendid pirarucu in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta<Else/>Deliver the splendid pirarucu to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/></If></If></If>.

You're doubtless aware, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Mistress<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, that we Qitari possess eminently keen noses. Even in pitch-black darkness, we can discern one of our own from another and locate them.

However, the caverns we explore can be filled with strange gases that confuse our sense of smell. To cut through this haze, we've taken to using a special perfume, which I would concoct with your assistance.
At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find amber─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not mine three pieces for me?
At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find lavender─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not gather three sprigs for me?
In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta dwells a fish called the pirarucu─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not catch one for me?
That will suffice to make a goodly batch of the stuff to help keep us safe during our explorations. Much obliged, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>!
In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
It is possible to find amber at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three pieces for me.
It is possible to find lavender at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three sprigs for me.
It is possible to find pirarucu in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. I'd be much obliged if you could catch one for me.
<sniff> <sniff> You've returned with what I seek, and no mistake. Now, if I might examine it...
My, such a potent smell! This will serve most splendidly, oh yes!
With a spot of refining, it will make a scent that is unmistakable in the caverns. Hehe, 'tis time once again to put my skills as a perfumer to use!
